<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2642</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Primary colors-Additive Color processes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die PrimärFarbe-zusatz Farbe Prozesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les processus primaires de couleur de 
couleur-Additif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os processos preliminares da cor do cor-Aditivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I processi primari di colore dell'colore-Additivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχικές χρώμα-πρόσθετες διαδικασίες χρώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los procesos primarios del color del 
color-Añadido</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrated the additive color process of the Primary Colors (RGB) such as is illustrated in the production of photographs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">primary colors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den additiven Farbe Prozeß 
der Primärfarben (RGB) demonstrierte wie, wird in der Produktion der 
Fotographien veranschaulicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation comme laquelle a démontré le 
processus additif de couleur des couleurs primaires (RVB) est 
illustrée dans la production des photographies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre o processo aditivo da 
cor das cores preliminares (RGB) como é ilustrado na produção das 
fotografias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione cui ha dimostrato il processo 
cumulativo di colore dei colori primari (RGB) come è illustrata nella
produzione delle fotografie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που κατέδειξε την πρόσθετη διαδικασία 
χρώματος των αρχικών χρωμάτων (RGB) όπως είναι διευκρινισμένη
στην παραγωγή των φωτογραφιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación por ejemplo la cual demostró el 
proceso aditivo del color de los colores primarios (RGB) se ilustra en
la producción de fotografías.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärfarben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleurs primaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cores preliminares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colori primari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχικά χρώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
